Body:
l = lookup.TemplateLookup(cache_dir=module_base, cache_type='file')
l.put_string('test',
    """
                <%!
                    callcount = [0]
                %>
                <%def name="foo()" cached="True">
                    this is foo
                    <%
                    callcount[0] += 1
                    %>
                </%def>

                ${foo()}
                ${foo()}
                ${foo()}
                callcount: ${callcount}
        """
    )
t = l.get_template('test')
m = self._install_mock_cache(t)
assert result_lines(l.get_template('test').render()) == ['this is foo',
    'this is foo', 'this is foo', 'callcount: [1]']
eq_(m.kwargs, {'dir': module_base, 'type': 'file'})
